name: RenderBlockScreenEffectEvent.OverlayType
description: The type of the block overlay to be rendered.

methods.name: values
methods.description: Returns an array containing the constants of this enum class, in the order they are declared.

methods.name: valueOf
exceptions: IllegalArgumentException - if this enum class has no constant with the specified name
methods.description: Returns the enum constant of this class with the specified name. The string must match exactly an identifier used to declare an enum constant in this class. (Extraneous whitespace characters are not permitted.)

enum_constants.name: FIRE
enum_constants.description: The type of the overlay when the player is burning / on fire.

enum_constants.name: BLOCK
enum_constants.description: The type of overlay when the player is suffocating inside a solid block.

enum_constants.name: WATER
enum_constants.description: The type of overlay when the player is underwater.
